message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that can greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11750. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering the value it could bring to my business.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11900. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $11900. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11250. This is a very good price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, and I'll also throw in an additional $500 for any additional services or support you can provide. Can we meet at this price?

I appreciate the additional services and support you're offering, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
